revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 69:;Tauris, daughter of Zenon;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 32 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 4 obols 5.5, naubion drachmas 3 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 8 obols 3.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 84 obols 28) eparourion drachmas 22 obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 5.5, kollybos drachma 1 obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 77;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2;;and Euhemeros, son of Chairemon;;orchard taxes for the 12th year drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 12) Petalion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petalion, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8 obols 4, swine tax obols 5 chalki 2;;Taskouis, daughter of Mysthes (Ptolemaios, water guard);;(in left margin: obols 10) naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2.5;;for the 12th year likewise: obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2.5;;Didyme, daughter of Heras (Hellen);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obol 1) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 22 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5, in total drachmas 23 obols 5 chalki 2;;Heron, son of Onnophris, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Diodoros, son of Hatres (Mystharion, son of Hatres, grandson of Pkiouk);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 2) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5 obol 1, tax on the produce of olives obols 4.5, naubion obols 3 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 4.5;;Mystharion, son of Diodoros, grandson of Hatres, mother Zoidos;;guard tax , obols 28;;Thermouthis, daughter of Papeis (Papeis the blind);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 4) orchard taxes apomoira drachma 1 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 4.5, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obol 1 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 3.5;;Thatres, daughter of Pnepheros (Ptolemaios, son of Kerkes);;(in left margin: drachmas 20) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 8 obol 0.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 5.5, naubion obols 5, surcharges drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 5 obols 2.5, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 2, in total drachmas 19 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;in total for thte day drachmas 420 obols 12.;(Pachon) 30 likewise:;Harsiesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Harsiesis, mother Thatres, drachmas 8;;Apollonia, daughter of Teberis (Akoution);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8) public rent 12th year drachmas 8, surcharges obols 3, drachmas 8 obols 3;;Domitius Lucillianus through the agency of Petheus, son of Harsiesis (priest of Harpochrates);;(in left margin: drachmas 36 obols 20) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, naubion obols 5.5 chalki2, surcharges drachmas 2;;eparourion drachmas 5 obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 17 obols 4;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 19 obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5, in total drachmas 20 obols 2.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
